name: SDI Semiconductor Instruments
overview: Established in 1998, SDI has evolved into one of the largest semiconductor equipment brokerages, has now built up an international network of sales agents and offices. SDI’s technical focus is on the semiconductor manufacturing process, particularly metrology and QC equipment, lithography equipment, deposition and coating equipment, including refurbished KLA wafer inspection equipment, refurbished Nikon , Ultratech and ASML steppers and scanners, AMAT cluster tools, DISCO saws , assembly equipment and surface mount technology equipment. SDI fabsurplus.com works by using the latest technology to continuously monitor the used equipment market place. SDI’s sales agents contact their clients mainly by sending e-mail listings of the high technology systems for sale to a database of key contacts carefully developed over time to minimize selling time. SDI has experience of clearance of used semiconductor manufacturing equipment from facilities, and can advise on marketing surplus assets.
